meanings.sent1: The unassuaged pain in his leg made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent2: Her unassuaged fear of spiders kept her from entering the dark basement.
meanings.sent3: The unassuaged hunger of the bear led it to raid the campsite for food.
meanings.sent4: The unassuaged thirst for knowledge drove her to read every book in the library.
meanings.sent5: The unassuaged longing for home made him cherish every moment with his family.

meanings.sent1: The unassuaged customer demanded a refund for the faulty product.
meanings.sent2: His unassuaged desire for success motivated him to work harder.
meanings.sent3: The unassuaged child kept asking for more candy at the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: Her unassuaged curiosity about the mysterious noise led her to investigate further.
meanings.sent5: The unassuaged anger in his voice was evident during the argument.
